FULL TITLE : AN ACT IMPOSING THE DEATH PENALTY FOR SPECIFIC CRIMES, REPEALING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9346, ENTITLED ꞌAN ACT PROHIBITING THE IMPOSITION OF THE DEATH PENALTY IN THE PHILIPPINESꞌ, FURTHER AMENDING ACT NO. 3815, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS ꞌTHE REVISED PENAL CODEꞌ AND REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7080, ENTITLED ꞌAN ACT DEFINING AND PENALIZING THE CRIME OF PLUNDERꞌ, AND AMENDING ACT NO. 9165, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ꞌCOMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002ꞌ, REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8177, ENTITLED ꞌACT DESIGNATING DEATH BY LETHAL INJECTIONꞌ, AND OTHER PENAL LAWS
ABSTRACT : Seeks to impose death penalty on the following crimes: a. as defined under Act No. 3815, otherwise known as the Revised Penal Code, as amended: 1. Treason 2. Qualified Piracy; 3. Rebellion or Insurrection; 4. Coup d’etat under 5. Malversation of public funds or property where the amount involved is seventy five million pesos (Php75,000,000.00) or more; 6. Parricide; 7. Murder; 8. Rape; 9. Kidnapping and serious illegal detention; 10. Robbery; 11. Estafa when committed under the circumstances defined in PD No. 1689; and 12. Destructive Arson. b. unlawful acts defined and penalized under RA No. 9165, otherwise known as the Comprehensive Dangerous Drugs Act of 2002, in Sections 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 (1-8), 16, 19, and 20 thereof; c. plunder as defined under RA No. 7080, as amended; d. Carnapping as defined under RA No. 6539 e. Violation of RA No. 6235, otherwise known as the anti-Hijacking Law. States that death penalty shall be executed either by a. firing squad; b. hanging; or c. lethal injection.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ABANTE, BIENVENIDO JR. M.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-08
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2019-07-24
